means: 亚瑟王的圆桌武士之一人，高洁之士

sentence.Network_en: Other famous Round Table Knights included Lancelot , Bedevere, Bors, Galahad , Perceval and Modred.

means.word_mean: 1. (Arthurian legend) the most virtuous knight of the Round Table; was able to see the Holy Grail
